channel.title: 🏢 Soongsil University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Soongsil University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Episodic Future Thinking Mechanism for Multi-agent Reinforcement Learning
item.description: RL agents make better decisions by simulating future scenarios, considering diverse agent behaviors, and using character inference for improved decision-making.
